mapper.select: SELECT a.*,i.`name` as 'staffIdName',h.`name` as 'depIdName',g.`name` as 'defaultStorehouseIdName',f.`name` as 'defaultCustomerIdName', e.`name` as 'defaultSupplierIdName',d.`name` as 'saleUnitIdName',c.`name` as 'purUnitIdName',b.`name` as 'itemTypeIdName' from t_item a left JOIN t_item_type b on a.itemTypeId = b.fid LEFT JOIN t_unit c on a.purUnitId = c.fid LEFT JOIN t_unit d on a.saleUnitId = d.fid LEFT JOIN t_supplier e on a.defaultSupplierId = e.fid LEFT JOIN t_customer f on a.defaultCustomerId = f.fid LEFT JOIN t_store g on a.defaultStorehouseId = g.fid LEFT JOIN t_department h on a.depId = h.fid LEFT JOIN t_staff i on a.staffId = i.fid where a.fdisable = 0 and (a.code like '%${str}%' or a.name like '%${str}%' or a.model like '%${str}%' or a.specs like '%${str}%' or a.parameter like '%${str}%' or a.custItemCode like '%${str}%' or a.custItemName like '%${str}%' or a.custItemModel like '%${str}%' or a.custItemSpecs like '%${str}%')
